response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts unparalleled quality but also comes with a comprehensive set of features that cater to a wide range of needs. Given its unique value proposition and the attention to detail put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to us. However, for the sake of negotiation, let me propose an offer of $15,000 for this remarkable product. We're confident that you'll find its benefits to be well worth the investment. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
